name: Final Game (Minscie)
description:
It's the final game before the world ends in flames.

But most importantly, don't forget the boss.

SHIFT = punch boss

SPACE = kick boss

CTRL = grab boss

ARROW KEYS = movement

Tips:

- You score points from doing damage

- Boss not hitting the ground for long periods increases the multiplier

- Water from the firehydrants can slow down the fire
